City Hall
=========

812 N 16th Street Orange TX 77630
[Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/812+N+16th+Street+Orange+TX+77630)

812 N 16th Street
Orange, TX 77630

Phone:

[409-883-1081](tel:4098831081)

Link:
[City Hall Page](https://orangetexas.gov/175/City-Hall)

Monday through Friday
8 am to 5 pm
